reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Supporting the Republic of Burkina Faso with equipment and preventive medical supplies to confront the emerging corona virus (Covid-19) within the group of 26 countries

description.narrative: Providing preventive medical supplies to the Ministry of Health in Burkina Faso to confront the emerging corona virus, Covid-19
Reducing the spread of the emerging corona virus, supporting the health sector in facing the corona virus, and strengthening health services in combating the spread of the corona virus

The health sector continues to provide curative and preventive services to (2,032,000 beneficiaries) of health sector workers and citizens, educating citizens in dealing with the pandemic, taking preventive precautions and limiting its spread of the Corona virus.

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
